welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Steger, a small town known for its friendly locals and rich history. We invite you to explore and soak in the beauty of our city. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gary/Chicago International Airport provides services for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Gary/Chicago International Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport is responsible for handling all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves domestic flights and is equipped with modern amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Municipal Airport handles flights to and from various countries and offers a variety of duty-free shopping and dining options.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
